content: With respect to our revenue, gross profit and gross margin in the period, revenues for the three months into June 30, 2022, were $10.9 million, representing an increase of $7.6 million or 233% as compared to the same period in 2021, driven in part by the merger with Reflect systems on February 17, 2022, and the company's successful sales activities as a combined company post merger. Our prospects for additional revenue, profit and growth are significantly enhanced by our achievement of an ARR run rate exceeding $14.5 million, well on pace to exceed our $15 million year end goal and projections.
